data.title: How to Access Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise DLC Content
data.meta_description: In this video, you'll learn how to access the content included in the Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise DLC.
data.text:
In this video, you'll learn how to access the content included in the Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise DLC.

In this article, you'll learn how to access the content included in the Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise DLC.

Important

In order to play the content in the Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise DLC, you must have Animal Crossing: New Horizons.

Some of the items, events, and features included in the Happy Home Paradise DLC become available after making certain progress in the game. Continue playing and designing vacation homes to expand your experiences.

You can play Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise by purchasing it on Nintendo eShop or by downloading it at no additional cost if you have a Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership.

Use the table below to understand the difference between purchasing the DLC and downloading it for free with a Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership.

Nintendo eShop Purchase Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack Membership Cost Price available on Nintendo eShop Free with membership Who can play

The account that purchased the DLC

All users on the purchasing account's primary console

Any account with an individual membership

All accounts that are part of a Nintendo Account family group with a family membership

When it can be played Indefinitely For the duration of the active membership Internet requirements

Internet connection not required to access content

Internet connection and Nintendo Switch Online membership required to use online features

Internet connection required when launching the game

Internet connection required to use online features

Save data

Stored on the console

Nintendo Switch Online membership required for save data back-up feature

Supported by island and resident transfer features

Stored on the console

If membership expires, save data is retained and can be accessed again after purchasing another membership or purchasing DLC separately

Supported by save data back-up, island transfer and resident transfer features

What to do

Will you be accessing Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise through a Nintendo eShop purchase or through a free download as part of a Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership?

Nintendo eShop purchaseNintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack download

Purchase the Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise DLC on Nintendo eShop.

The DLC must be downloaded to your console to access the content. If it has been deleted, it can be redownloaded on Nintendo eShop.

Ensure that your Animal Crossing: New Horizons software is updated to the latest version.

Launch Animal Crossing: New Horizons and visit the airport to request to go to work.

The option to go to work becomes available at least one day after all of the following conditions have been met:

The Resident Services building has been completed (upgraded from a tent)

You have attended Tom Nook's DIY workshop

Your resident has a house (upgraded from a tent)

Begin a Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership or join a Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack family membership if you do not already have an active membership.

Download the Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Happy Home Paradise DLC for free from the Nintendo Switch Online menu on Nintendo eShop.

Ensure that your Animal Crossing: New Horizons software is updated to the latest version.

Launch Animal Crossing: New Horizons and visit the airport to request to go to work.

The option to go to work becomes available at least one day after all of the following conditions have been met:

The Resident Services building has been completed (upgraded from a tent)

You have attended Tom Nook's DIY workshop

Your resident has a house (upgraded from a tent)
